title: Run to You
description: The day hockey star Brandon Taylor won his gold Olympic medal, as a defenseman for Team Canada, was the best day of his life. But it turned to the worst day when he returned to the Olympic Village and found his fiancee with another man. Brandon dedicated himself to helping his team, the Chicago Ice Bandits, win the Stanley Cup, but vowed never to trust a woman again. Then he meets jewelry designer Greta Patton. As the long hockey season winds down, and the Ice Bandits challenge for the Cup, he finds himself falling for Greta. Can he learn to trust a woman again?
author: Ginger Rapsus
